essential_properties.name: organizationSlug
essential_properties.description: The slug of the organization the events belong to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

essential_properties.name: eventId
essential_properties.description: The ID of the event to retrieve (either the numeric primary-key or the hexadecimal ID as reported by the raven client)
